body:
Comment 5: 
Making gofmt do "the right thing" with -spaces and -align=false does not make much
sense: The output in the -
align=false mode is the input intended for the tabwriter package. It is neither aligned
nor misaligned, and it is 
only reasonably readable because go/printer removes control characters (such as '\v' and
'\f' intended to drive 
the tabwriter) from the output stream.
